sn34.12:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.12:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo.
sn34.12:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.12:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
